Robots

Astrobee

Robotic microgravity free-flyers aboard the International Space Station. LASER has extensively tested our online learning and rendezvous algorithms on Astrobee.

CADRE

Autonomous multi-agent lunar rovers, headed to the unexplored Reiner Gamma region. LASER has co-developed CADREâ€™s motion planner and distributed leader election algorithms.

LASER MRF (Murph)

USC/LASER Microgravity Robotics Facility, under development. Anticipated: 2026.

LASER PRF (Perf)

USC/LASER Planetary Robotics Facility, under development. Anticipated: 2026.

WALLY

An autonomous planar wall-climbing robot.
